paragraphs.content: And the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

paragraphs.content: Son of man, What is the vine tree more than any tree, or than a branch which is among the trees of the forest?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Son of man, What is the vine tree more than any tree, or than a branch which is among the trees of the forest?

paragraphs.content: Shall wood be taken thereof to do any work? or will men take a pin of it to hang any vessel thereon?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Shall wood be taken thereof to do any work? or will men take a pin of it to hang any vessel thereon?

paragraphs.content: Behold, it is cast into the fire for fuel; the fire devoureth both the ends of it, and the midst of it is burned. Is it meet for any work?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Behold, it is cast into the fire for fuel; the fire devoureth both the ends of it, and the midst of it is burned. Is it meet for any work?

paragraphs.content: Behold, when it was whole, it was meet for no work: how much less shall it be meet yet for any work, when the fire hath devoured it, and it is burned?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Behold, when it was whole, it was meet for no work: how much less shall it be meet yet for any work, when the fire hath devoured it, and it is burned?

paragraphs.content: ¶ Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; As the vine tree among the trees of the forest, which I have given to the fire for fuel, so will I give the inhabitants of Jerusalem.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ Therefore thus saith the Lord God; As the vine tree among the trees of the forest, which I have given to the fire for fuel, so will I give the inhabitants of Jerusalem.

paragraphs.content: And I will set my face against them; they shall go out from one fire, and another fire shall devour them; and ye shall know that I am the LORD, when I set my face against them.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And I will set my face against them; they shall go out from one fire, and another fire shall devour them; and ye shall know that I am the Lord, when I set my face against them.

paragraphs.content: And I will make the land desolate, because they have committed a trespass, saith the Lord GOD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And I will make the land desolate, because they have committed a trespass, saith the Lord God.
